languages.text: "Мой папа — Кас Беллардо. Он с гостями. А моя мама убежала, мне сказали, что она ненавидит папу и дедушку. Меня, наверное, тоже, я не знаю. Это было давно, я уже даже не скучаю по ней. Я скучаю по дедушке... он был самый хороший". {n}Девочка сжимает губы и тихо, очень по-взрослому, вздыхает.{/n}

"My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

Это было давно, я уже даже не скучаю по ней. Я скучаю по дедушке... он был самый хороший". {n}Девочка сжимает губы и тихо, очень по-взрослому, вздыхает.{/n}

It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

languages.text: “我爸爸叫卡斯·贝拉多，他和客人们在一起。我妈妈跑了，大家都说她恨我爸爸和我爷爷。我猜她也恨我吧，我也不知道。那已经是很久以前的事情了，我现在甚至根本不想她了。我想我爷爷……他是最好的人。”{n}她紧紧地抿住嘴唇，发出了一声安静的叹息，根本不像是孩子该有的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我爸爸叫卡斯·贝拉多，他和客人们在一起。我妈妈跑了，大家都说她恨我爸爸和我爷爷。我猜她也恨我吧，我也不知道。那已经是很久以前的事情了，我现在甚至根本不想她了。我想我爷爷……他是最好的人。”{n}她紧紧地抿住嘴唇，发出了一声安静的叹息，根本不像是孩子该有的声音。{/n}

languages.text: «Mi padre es Kas Bellardo. Está con los invitados. Y mi madre se escapó. Me dijeron que odiaba a papá y al abuelo. Supongo que a mí también; no lo sé. Fue hace mucho, así que ya no la echo de menos. Al abuelo sí... era el más bueno». {n}Aprieta los labios y suspira de forma muy poco infantil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi padre es Kas Bellardo. Está con los invitados. Y mi madre se escapó. Me dijeron que odiaba a papá y al abuelo. Supongo que a mí también; no lo sé. Fue hace mucho, así que ya no la echo de menos. Al abuelo sí... era el más bueno». {n}Aprieta los labios y suspira de forma muy poco infantil.{/n}

languages.text: 「パパの名前はキャス・ベラルド。お客さんと一緒にいる。ママはパパとおじいちゃんが大嫌いだって言って出てっちゃった。私のことも嫌いなんだと思う。ずっと前のことだからわかんないし、もうママにも会いたくない。でも、おじいちゃんに会いたいな…一番優しかったの」{n}彼女は口をつぐみ、子供らしくない静かなため息をついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「パパの名前はキャス・ベラルド。お客さんと一緒にいる。ママはパパとおじいちゃんが大嫌いだって言って出てっちゃった。私のことも嫌いなんだと思う。ずっと前のことだからわかんないし、もうママにも会いたくない。でも、おじいちゃんに会いたいな…一番優しかったの」{n}彼女は口をつぐみ、子供らしくない静かなため息をついた。{/n}

languages.text: "Mein Papa ist Kas Bellardo. Er ist bei den Gästen. Und meine Mama ist weggelaufen, sie hat gesagt, sie hasst Papa und Opa. Ich denke, mich hasst sie auch, aber ich weiß es nicht. Das ist lange her, ich vermisse sie nicht einmal mehr. Ich vermisse Opa ... Er war der Netteste." {n}Sie presst die Lippen zusammen und seufzt leise und überhaupt nicht kindlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein Papa ist Kas Bellardo. Er ist bei den Gästen. Und meine Mama ist weggelaufen, sie hat gesagt, sie hasst Papa und Opa. Ich denke, mich hasst sie auch, aber ich weiß es nicht. Das ist lange her, ich vermisse sie nicht einmal mehr. Ich vermisse Opa ... Er war der Netteste." {n}Sie presst die Lippen zusammen und seufzt leise und überhaupt nicht kindlich.{/n}

languages.text: « Mon papa s'appelle Kas Bellardo. Il est avec les invités. Ma maman s'est enfuie, on m'a dit qu'elle détestait papa et papi. Peut-être qu'elle me détestait, moi aussi, je ne sais pas. Elle est partie il y a tellement longtemps qu'elle ne me manque même plus. Mais papi me manque... Il était très gentil. » {n}Elle pince les lèvres et laisse échapper un soupir qui la fait paraître bien plus vieille que son âge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mon papa s'appelle Kas Bellardo. Il est avec les invités. Ma maman s'est enfuie, on m'a dit qu'elle détestait papa et papi. Peut-être qu'elle me détestait, moi aussi, je ne sais pas. Elle est partie il y a tellement longtemps qu'elle ne me manque même plus. Mais papi me manque... Il était très gentil. » {n}Elle pince les lèvres et laisse échapper un soupir qui la fait paraître bien plus vieille que son âge.{/n}

languages.text: "Babamın adı Kas Bellardo. Misafirlerle birlikte. Annemse kaçıp gitti, bana babamdan ve dedemden nefret ettiğini söylediler. Galiba benden de ediyor, bilmiyorum. Üstünden uzun zaman geçti, artık onu özlemiyorum bile. Dedemi özlüyorum ama... Çok iyi biriydi." {n}Dudaklarını sıkıyor ve sessiz, hiç çocuksu olmayan bir iç çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My dad is Kas Bellardo. He's with the guests. And my mum ran away, they told me she hates Dad and Grandpa. I guess she hates me too, I don't know. It was a long time ago, I don't even miss her anymore. I miss Grandpa... He was the nicest." {n}She presses her lips together and lets out a quiet, very unchildlike sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Babamın adı Kas Bellardo. Misafirlerle birlikte. Annem kaçıp gitti, bana babamdan ve dedemden nefret ettiğini söylediler. Sanırım benden de nefret ediyor, bilmiyorum. Üstünden uzun zaman geçti, artık onu özlemiyorum bile. Dedemi özlüyorum ben... Çok iyi biriydi." {n}Dudaklarını sıkıyor ve sessiz, hiç çocuksu olmayan bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n}
